snippet: Because of problems related to Hurricane Sandy, the soccer teams will face each other in conference semifinals in Washington first, instead of New Jersey, and then do the reverse.
lead_paragraph: Because of problems related to Hurricane Sandy, the soccer teams will face each other in conference semifinals in Washington first, instead of New Jersey, and then do the reverse.

headline.seo: Red Bulls and D.C. United Swap Sites for M.L.S. Playoff Games
headline.main: Red Bulls and D.C. United Swap Sites for 2 Playoff Games
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls and D.C. United Swap Sites for 2 Playoff Games
